headline: Jefferies Cuts Clorox Price Target to $145 Amid ERP Transition Turbulence, Maintains Buy
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) is one of the Best Stagflation Stocks to Buy Now. On June 26, Jefferies lowered its price target on Clorox (NYSE: CLX) from $167 to $145, while reiterating a Buy rating on the stock. The firm cited short-term uncertainty stemming from Clorox’s upcoming rollout of its U.S. Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) […]
